work.name: HTC VIVE
work.summary: VIVERSE is dedicated to building the metaverse, and I am mainly responsible for creating services related to avatars.
highlights: Implement UI/UX using responsive and reusable components while working closely with designer and clarifying requirements from PM.

Collaborate with backend team member to manage features and implement complex business logic related to avatars and assets. Write functions using clean code, ensuring maintainability without over-designing.
Maintain and extend cartoonish avatar creator service, utilizing WebGL skills and 3D knowledge, while paying close attention to performance optimization.
Optimize and enhance avatar models, collaborate closely with 3D artists, and ensure the quality of the models.
Research and deliver experimental POC tasks.
